metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6738 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Qualcomm crypto enginedriver in Android before 2016-11-05 could enable a local maliciousapplication to execute arbitrary code within the context of the kernel.This issue is rated as High because it first requires compromising aprivileged process. Android ID: A-30034511. References: QualcommQC-CR#1050538.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
